name: Sneaky Sphynx
description:
UPDATE: A bug has been found in the second level, which prevents you from completing the game. Has been fixed in the Post Jam versions.

Sneaky Sphynx

A special K9 Unit known as the HOUNDS have stolen the plans to a top secret Project codenamed: M.I.L.K.

Collect the clues to find the project in their DOGHOUSE facility but take care it's heavily guarded!

  •  ARROW KEYS - Move
  • INTERACT - X

#extracreditsJam
